snippet.title: Video Hustler/Lil' Hustler 1981, Konami/Dynamo Games
snippet.description: Also called Lil' Hustler in the United States. In this game, produced by Konami, you are playing pool, and you have to make sure to shoot each balls into the holes (except the cue ball, since that will result in a ball lost and an AUTOMATIC turn lost.) with 3 attempts, if you do not get a ball in with those 3 attempts, you will lose a cue ball.
